column1: MRI image size (256, 256, 1) illustrating the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with coronal section. We carefully observe slice n°79 beginning from the back of the skull. The section reveals the presence of: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 1802.1973 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4231.9336 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 209.6191 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 230.7129 mm³, the left putamen of volume 135.7910 mm³, the left nucleus accumbens of volume 38.2324 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 1977.5391 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4137.0117 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 166.1133 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 257.0801 mm³, the right putamen of volume 181.9336 mm³ and the right nucleus accumbens of volume 39.5508 mm³.
